question: The "Recipes for Fifty-Two Ailments" is an ancient medical text of which nation?
explanation: Recipes for Fifty-Two Ailments, also known as Wushi'er Bingfang, is an ancient Chinese medical text. This text was written during the period of Qin and Han dynasties. This text has the first known mention of wormwood (qinghao) which is used to cure female haemorrhoids and intermittent fevers.
